content.body: vhilla: I guess it's not just up to WebKit though, if Chromium and Gecko want to have this specific divide there's nothing really stopping you from working on specifying it, unless Yusuke comes up with a strong reason not to, but I kinda doubt it

1. Custom elements
2. slot
3. search

?
